document.full_text: hsbc's new boss is to cut back in retail banking and may sell its u.s. credit card arm in a bid to cut $3.5 billion in costs and revive flagging profits.
document.title: hsbc in $3.5 billion cost-cutting overhaul
lines_and_colors: hsbc's new boss is to cut back in retail banking and may sell its u.s. credit card arm in a bid to cut $3.5 billion in costs and revive flagging profits.
